page.title: 12TRADE - SHOPS PART 2
page.content: Some people do all their shopping{once {a week}and don't go to the shops again for several days. A few people only shop during the{half term}and other {holidays.}But most people shop evenly through the week. Some people go to larger stores for their shopping e.g.{Tescos in Truro and the{Co-op in Wadebridge.}People from far away places like{London stay near St Merryn for their holidays and{use the local shops. Everyone thought that the bargains in St Merryn were always good but none of the shops give away{free gifts. Its about{50 to 50}whether people shop in St Merryn for{Christmas}or not {No - one complained}about the goods they receive and everyone thought that the{prices were fair}for the goods they had bought.
